    Simulate microbiome perturbation data

    sim_ts_perturb.Rd

    To simulate microbiome longitudinal count data for perturbation experiments with user defined starting and ending time point, effect size and duration of perturbation

    sim_ts_perturb(
  endtime,
  n_species,
  n_depth,
  Sigma = NULL,
  beta,
  t1,
  t2,
  time,
  species,
  duration
)

    Arguments

    endtime

    the number of time points of the sample

    n_species

    number of species

    n_depth

    sequence depth

    Sigma

    correlation matrix for muti-nomal distribution

    beta

    effect of perturbation

    t1

    time of reaching the maximum of perturbation

    t2

    time of ending the maximum of perturbation

    time

    the start time for perturbation

    species

    perturbed species

    duration

    the duration of perturbation

    Value

    the simulated data

    Examples

    sim_ts_perturb(endtime=30, n_species=30, 1000, Sigma=NULL, beta=1,species=c(1,2,3),time=4, t1=8,t2=12,duration = 16)
#>     V1  V2  V3 V4 V5  V6 V7 V8 V9 V10 V11 V12 V13 V14 V15 V16 V17 V18 V19 V20
